categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: The Reconquest of Ord Radama was a major battle of the Rim Campaign—one of the large military campaigns near the final years of the Great Galactic War. Fought between the reconstituted Sith Empire's army under the Sith Lord Darth Malgus and the Knights of the Jedi Order, the Reconquest lasted over fifty-one days and saw massive losses on both sides. Malgus and his forces ultimately proved successful and succeeded in destroying their Jedi foes.
